title: Output Hello Kitty!
description: Write a program that prints 'Hello Kitty! :3' to the console using System.out.println.

title: Output a Greeting
description: Write a program that prints 'Good morning, world!' to the console using System.out.print.

title: Formatted Output
description: Write a program that prints the value of Pi as 3.14 using System.out.printf.

title: Print an Integer
description: Write a program that declares an integer variable with the value 42 and prints it using System.out.println.

title: Print a Double
description: Write a program that declares a double variable with the value 3.14159 and prints it using System.out.println.
